adjectives.description: cadaveric (comparative more cadaveric, superlative most cadaveric)

examples: Hodgkin had just returned from his second visit to Paris, where he had learned to prepare and dissect cadaveric specimens.

entries.meaning: Caused by coming into contact with a dead body, a cadaver.
examples: He invoked cadaveric poisoning as the reason for the high death rate among priests and monks  […]
